author: Frederic Lardinois
title: Babbel makes its language learning app free for all US students
description: Babbel, the Berlin-based paid language learning app, today announced that, in light of the COVID-19 pandemic, it is making its service available for free to all K-12 and college students until the end of the term. Previously, the company offered a similar dea…
